hero.title: Together the journey is more fun! Especially with
hero.description: We offer Twin Travel - a unique application that connects conventional navigation, travel tips, and new acquaintances!

video.not_supported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

features.section1.title: Find interesting things
features.section1.description: Find out about all the events in your city - concerts, exhibitions, parties, and much more. Filter events by interests and location so you don't miss anything.

features.section2.title: Fast and convenient currency exchange
features.section2.description: Easily check the latest exchange rates and locate the nearest exchange offices for your convenience.

features.section3.title: Messenger right here
features.section3.description: Find travel companions who share your interests and make every trip unforgettable. Whether you're looking for adventure, relaxation, or cultural exploration, connect with like-minded individuals to create memorable experiences together.

testimonials.title: What our community is saying
testimonials.subtitle: See why travelers love Twin Travel
testimonials.card1.text: Twin Travel is just a find! Thanks to the application, I found so many interesting events that I didn’t even know about before. It’s also very convenient to keep track of exchange rates while traveling.
testimonials.card2.text: Twin Travel is incredibly helpful! I planned my trip seamlessly and discovered unique places I wouldn't have known otherwise. The app made everything easier.
testimonials.card3.text: Amazing app! I managed to organize my travels efficiently and saved a lot of time. The exchange rate tracker is a game-changer!
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions

faq.card1.question: What is Twin Travel?
faq.card1.answer: Twin Travel is a mobile app that helps you discover events around you, plan your routes, and exchange currency with ease.

faq.card2.question: How do I create an account on Twin Travel?
faq.card2.answer: You can create an account by downloading the app, selecting 'Sign Up,' and entering your email address and password.

faq.card3.question: Is Twin Travel available in multiple languages?
faq.card3.answer: Yes, Twin Travel supports several languages to ensure ease of use for travelers worldwide.

faq.card4.question: Can I track my expenses using Twin Travel?
faq.card4.answer: Absolutely! Twin Travel includes a built-in feature to manage and monitor your travel expenses.

faq.card5.question: How does Twin Travel help with currency exchange?
faq.card5.answer: Twin Travel provides real-time currency exchange rates and helps you locate the nearest exchange services.

faq.card6.question: Does Twin Travel work offline?
faq.card6.answer: Some features, like saved routes and downloaded event information, can be accessed offline.

cta.title: Ready for adventure? Download Twin Travel!
